mapper.select: SELECT R_SEQ,R_NAME,R_POINT,R_SELL,R_FILE,R_REGDATE,R_DETAIL,C.B_SEQ,B_NAME FROM REWARD R JOIN COMPANY C ON R.B_SEQ=C.B_SEQ WHERE R_SELL='Y'

SELECT R_SEQ,R_NAME,R_POINT,R_SELL,R_FILE,R_REGDATE,R_DETAIL,B_SEQ,B_NAME FROM (SELECT R_SEQ,R_NAME,R_POINT,R_SELL,R_FILE,R_REGDATE,R_DETAIL,C.B_SEQ,B_NAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER (ORDER BY R_REGDATE DESC) AS RN FROM REWARD R JOIN COMPANY C ON R.B_SEQ=C.B_SEQ WHERE R_SELL='Y' AND R_DETAIL=#{r_detail} AND R_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{r_name} ||'%') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{sNum} AND #{eNum}
